text: aur Allah taâ€™ala ne tumhaare liye tumhaare gharo mein sukunath ki jageh banaadi hai aur osi ne tumhaare liye chaupaayo ki khaalo ke ghar bana diye hai jinhe tum halka phulka paate ho, apne kooch ke din aur apne teherne ke din bhi aur un ki oon aur ruoo aur baalo se bhi us ne bahuth se samaan aur ek waqte muqarrara tak ke liye fayede ki cheeze banaayi
